org.ingatan.event
Class ImageToolbarEvent

java.lang.Object
  org.ingatan.event.ImageToolbarEvent

public class ImageToolbarEvent
extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulates an event originating from instances of the ImageToolbar class.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Thomas Everingham

Method Detail

getSource

public ImageToolbar getSource()
Gets the ImageToolbar instance at which this event originated.

Returns:
the ImageToolbar instance at which this event originated.

getEventID

public int getEventID()
Gets the eventID for this event. This is used to identify which toolbar button was clicked; compare the returned eventID with the fields of this class.

Returns:
the eventID for this event.

getEventDescription

public java.lang.String getEventDescription()
Gets the human readable description of this event.

Returns:
the human readable description of this event.

getEventIDDescription

public java.lang.String getEventIDDescription(int eventID)
Gets the human readable description of the event corresponding to the specified eventID.

Parameters:
eventID - the eventID of interest.
Returns:
the human readable description of the event corresponding to the specified eventID.
